name: Phoenix Hydrogen
headline: First commodity marketplace for hydrogen.
description: Phoenix Hydrogen is building the first commodity marketplace for hydrogen. This year, $9.5B in federal grants will fund the first hydrogen grids, but this ecosystem has no marketplace. We’re uniquely able to build one because we’re already working with big utilities on a fulfillment platform: a 1000'-tall underground warehouse for hydrogen.
tags: industry:energy-storage; industry:hydrogen-energy; industry:marketplace; industry:climate; industry:climatetech; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Shawn Drost, Founder
founders.description:
Shawn Drost is the co-founder and CEO at Phoenix Hydrogen. 
Previously: Founder @ Hack Reactor
Once ran a marathon without training; big toe still clicks
Dad to two toddlers (!!)

founders.name: Terence Vomocil, Founder
founders.description: Building green hydrogen midstream infrastructure supported by underground storage, a digital trading platform and creation of regional hydrogen hubs.

# Join the Hydrogen Ecosystem
# About
Phoenix Hydrogen is a developer-owner-operator of first-party salt cavern storage assets, and an integrator and lessor for colocated third-party projects across the hydrogen and PtX value chain.
[Work with Us](https://phoenixhydrogen.com/</careers>)Contact Us
##### Phoenix Hydrogen develops high-volume, low-cost hydrogen hubs with leading energy companies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5efaa65bb0171b499867c4c5/5eff4f95e45cb817c16aedaa_USGS%20\(5\).png)
# The Latest
Phoenix Hydrogen announces its governance board membership in SHINe, a leading DOE H2Hubs consortium. 
[Read more >>](https://phoenixhydrogen.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6999151771747069954>)
Phoenix Hydrogen CEO interviewed on the "Scaling Climate Tech" podcast.
[Listen >>](https://phoenixhydrogen.com/<https:/podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/shawn-drost-phoenix-hydrogen-building-amazon-com-for/id1604096548?i=1000590942086>)
# Leases Available
Major developers are leasing at our (undisclosed) first site to accelerate development timelines and reduce costs. Amenities include proven water, solar and wind resources, transmission, and low-cost hydrogen storage. 
[Contact Us](https://phoenixhydrogen.com/</platforms-hydrogen-marketplace>)
![A birds eye view of our property near the Arizona - California border](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5efaa65bb0171b499867c4c5/6424849a8d226f9bc73a134c_dji_fly_20221007_130816_5_1666397616740_video__1__AdobeExpress-min.gif)

generated_description:
### Phoenix Hydrogen: A New Dawn in Hydrogen Economics

**Overview**: Founded in 2021 and based in Berkeley, CA, Phoenix Hydrogen aims to revolutionize the hydrogen market by creating the first commodity marketplace for hydrogen. They're not just any startup; this Y Combinator Batch W22 graduate is stepping into the limelight as the federal government invests heavily in hydrogen infrastructures.

**Mission**: The mission is straightforward yet ambitious—to build a comprehensive marketplace for hydrogen, facilitating efficient trade and distribution. With $9.5 billion in federal grants this year designated for hydrogen grid development, there’s an urgent need for a structured marketplace. Phoenix Hydrogen is uniquely positioned to fill this gap, leveraging existing collaborations with major utilities to establish a robust fulfillment platform.

**Team**: With a compact team of just two, Phoenix Hydrogen demonstrates that big ideas can come from small teams. Spearheading this initiative is CEO Shawn Drost, who brings credible experience to the table, supported by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer.

**Current Initiatives**:
1. **Hydrogen Marketplace**: They’re developing a dynamic platform that will streamline hydrogen transactions.
2. **Hub Formation Platform**: This aims to facilitate the establishment of high-volume, low-cost hydrogen hubs in partnership with leading energy companies.
3. **Geological Storage**: They are also involved in the development of first-party salt cavern storage assets and orchestration of third-party projects to optimize the hydrogen value chain.

**Recent Highlights**: 
- Phoenix Hydrogen has been making waves by joining the governance board of SHINe, a top DOE H2Hubs consortium, signaling its growing influence in the industry.
- The CEO was recently featured on the "Scaling Climate Tech" podcast, discussing how Phoenix Hydrogen is set to be the "Amazon.com for hydrogen."

**Opportunities**: The startup is extending leasing opportunities at its undisclosed site, targeting major developers to expedite project development while minimizing costs. The site boasts favorable conditions, including access to water, solar, wind resources, and low-cost hydrogen storage.

**In Summary**: Phoenix Hydrogen is not just building a marketplace; they are laying the groundwork for an entire hydrogen economy. As they move forward, their innovative approach could redefine how hydrogen is stored, traded, and utilized. If you're curious, explore more about them on their [website](https://phoenixhydrogen.com/). 

In the evolving landscape of climate technology, companies like Phoenix Hydrogen showcase the potential of entrepreneurship to drive essential changes in energy sustainability.
